The Haxe Ludum Dare 32 Roundup

by Skial Bainn and Gama11 published on Friday 24th April 2015

Table of Contents

  • Haxe
  • Heaps
  • Luxe Engine
  • OpenFL
  • HaxeFlixel
  • Stencyl
  • HaxePunk
Suggest a link Correct this issue

This is the fourth dedicated Ludum Dare roundup for Haxe. Ludum Dare 32 took place between April 17th and 20th and the chosen theme was An Unconventional Weapon.

Haxe

  • 6 Pack Vendetta by Purple Apes using kit
  • Noodly Appendage by Lerc targeting JavaScript and HTML canvas
  • Badass Inc by Sébastien Bénard targeting Flash using personal libraries and source code available for download

  • Just Another Day by Matt Tuttle using yaml
  • Gravition by Damien Doussaud (Namide) using dune-lib and nape

Heaps

  • Jungle Hair by Nicolas Cannasse using Heaps
  • Dumb & Number by Mathieu Pistol targeting Flash using Heaps

Luxe Engine

  • BOOMBOX by Darek Greenly

  • Censored by Jérémy Faivre
  • Symmetric Torpedo by Francois van Niekerk
  • Food Fight by Joel Davis
  • FEATHERROCK by Fuzzy Wuzzie

Head over to the snõwkit community site to check out the LD32 Recap article and make sure your game is listed.

OpenFL

  • Extreme Flashing Fighter by Tomas Baudon and Sentsu
  • Alien Crab in the Ghostmaze by Xaychru
  • Seamus' Gun by the Gagabu Team using HaxePunk with source code available for download

  • The name of the game is Grab by Fernando Serboncini
  • Trigonoweapon by Myachin Sergey
  • Berry | The Last Straw by go_go_goto
  • Scary Faerie by jojocanard
  • Chlorine Dawn by wilbefast
  • The Fish Sniper by @DeCampanille
  • Circus Escape by TDogAndNateDizzleProductions

HaxeFlixel

  • Le Chef Farteaut by Diego Machado
  • Alien Escape by Tiago Ling

  • Paper Beats Tyranny by Sébastien Bernery
  • Sir Sprout by Hamfisted Studios
  • MV by Josh Schonstal
  • Soccer Punch by Papy Pilgrim using Ash
  • Frazzle Dazzle by Hexdie
  • The Legend of Yo-Yo Salesman by Sean Kim
  • Avian Days by esayitch
  • Blackbird by aeveis
  • braingun by thephantom
  • Brimstone by skryabiin
  • Buffer Overbash by sbot1101

  • Fathom by JoeCreates
  • Crash Bomb by binarybot
  • Defeating King Box by coded_ninja
  • Farmer Boy by FerraWare
  • Glorch's Great Escape by wg_phancock
  • HipStar by dkdwrek
  • KEYS: THE BOARD: THE DANCE: THE BATTLE: THE GAME by perfunctionist
  • Killin' It by shcromlet
  • Rock Paper Scissors ATTACK! by ruthie_pee
  • Thanks Guugle! by KitchsTweets
  • The Pen Is Mightier by james12802

  • ＢＥＤ✰ＨＯＧＧ by x01010111
  • Weapon of Choice by lion123
  • CurseMan by sbarrio
  • Follow Me by EdoardoLopes
  • What kind of power is Heart by rottenmage
  • April Bloom by Alexbrainbox
  • The Halfburn Incident by xhunterko
  • Tranquility by tanjent
  • Exploring Time by Belvar

Stencyl

  • Crayon Poke by Raiyumi
  • Elemental Castle Adventure by Merrak
  • Iridescent! by Osiaslemuel
  • Fishland King! by Torcado194
  • A Big Freakin' Ball O' Hurt by LetMeThink
  • Freddy's Challenge by Abiblablobla
  • Taggit! by JFraser
  • Turbo Moon Hero! by Photon
  • Love is a Weapon by mdotedot

HaxePunk

  • Seamus' Gun by the Gagabu Team with source code available for download
  • Ob3se by bartveldstra
  • Gravity by Pinpickle
  • Rhythm Gunner by ddrkirbyisq
